basics.name: James Shaver
basics.label: Senior Technical Account Manager
basics.summary: Organized and goal-oriented, fully committed to providing the highest possible standards of customer service and support. Analytical problem-solver, able to anticipate issues and define processes to resolve concerns and improve efficiency. Highly skilled in building client / team member relationships. Able to see the big picture, delegate effectively and motivate team members to achieve project completion on time.

roles.summary: Leading the development of enterprise-scale applications and mentoring a team of 5 developers.
highlights: Architected and implemented microservices infrastructure serving 2M+ daily active users
Reduced application load time by 60% through performance optimization and code splitting
Led migration from monolithic architecture to microservices using Docker and Kubernetes
Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes
Mentored 5 junior developers and conducted technical interviews

roles.summary: Developed and maintained multiple client-facing web applications using React and Node.js.
highlights: Built real-time collaboration features using WebSockets and Redis
Developed RESTful APIs serving 500K+ daily requests
Implemented automated testing increasing code coverage from 45% to 85%
Integrated payment processing systems handling $10M+ in transactions

work.name: StartUp Labs
work.summary: Contributed to various web development projects in a fast-paced startup environment.
highlights: Developed responsive web applications using Angular and React
Created automated deployment scripts reducing deployment errors by 80%
Participated in agile development process and daily standups

work.name: Another StartUp Labs
work.summary: two Contributed to various web development projects in a fast-paced startup environment.
highlights: Developed responsive web applications using Angular and React
Created automated deployment scripts reducing deployment errors by 80%
Participated in agile development process and daily standups

volunteer.summary: Leading development of open-source projects for non-profit organizations.
highlights: Built donation platform that raised $500K+ for local charities
Mentored 20+ volunteer developers on best practices
Organized monthly coding workshops for underrepresented groups

references.name: Michael Chen - CTO at TechCorp Solutions
references.reference: Sarah is an exceptional developer who consistently delivers high-quality code. Her ability to architect scalable solutions and mentor team members makes her an invaluable asset. I highly recommend her for any senior development position.

references.name: Emily Rodriguez - Product Manager at Digital Innovations
references.reference: Working with Sarah was a pleasure. She has a unique ability to translate complex technical concepts into business value. Her problem-solving skills and attention to detail are outstanding.

projects.name: DevMetrics Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time analytics dashboard for tracking development team productivity and code quality metrics
highlights: Built with React, D3.js, and Node.js
Processes 1M+ events daily using Apache Kafka
Reduced bug detection time by 40%

projects.name: CodeReview AI
projects.description: AI-powered code review assistant that automatically detects potential bugs and suggests improvements
highlights: Integrated with GitHub and GitLab
Uses machine learning to identify code patterns
Adopted by 50+ development teams
